named-query.name: InfraManagementInfoEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM InfraManagementInfoEntity a ORDER BY a.managementId

named-query.name: InfraManagementInfoEntity.findByOwnerRoleId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM InfraManagementInfoEntity a WHERE a.ownerRoleId = :ownerRoleId ORDER BY a.managementId

named-query.name: InfraManagementInfoEntity.findByFacilityId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM InfraManagementInfoEntity a WHERE a.facilityId = :facilityId

named-query.name: InfraCheckResultEntity.findByManagementId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM InfraCheckResultEntity a WHERE a.id.managementId = :managementId ORDER BY a.id.nodeId, a.id.moduleId

named-query.name: InfraCheckResultEntity.findByModuleId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM InfraCheckResultEntity a WHERE a.id.managementId = :managementId AND a.id.moduleId = :moduleId ORDER BY a.id.nodeId

named-query.name: InfraFileEntity.findAll
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM InfraFileEntity a ORDER BY a.fileId

named-query.name: FileTransferModuleInfoEntity.findByFileId
named-query.query: SELECT a FROM FileTransferModuleInfoEntity a WHERE a.infraFileEntity.fileId = :fileId
